text: Sir Donald Charles McKinnon (born 27 February 1939) is a New Zealand politician. He is a former Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Foreign Affairs of New Zealand. He was the Secretary-General of the Commonwealth of Nations from 2000 until 2008. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Profile: Don McKinnon - BBC news *The Global Panel Foundation Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:Deputy Prime Ministers of New Zealand Category:Commonwealth Secretaries-General
title: Don McKinnon
